Cooks' D plot data

Source: R/ols-plots-data.R
ols_prep_cdplot_data.Rd

Prepare data for cook's d bar plot.

ols_prep_cdplot_data(model, type = 1)

Arguments

model

An object of class lm.

Examples

model <- lm(mpg ~ disp + hp + wt, data = mtcars)
ols_prep_cdplot_data(model)
